info.title: UI API
info.description:
UI documentation is targeted towards User interfaces build to interact with the Arctic system.

This uses OAuth2 authentication.

scopes.user:write: Access to detailed user information and ability to update information
scopes.product:write: Access to write and update product information
scopes.order:write: Access to write and update order information

application/json.name: Codes specifically reserved for testing purposes

get.description:
The shadow product which will be merged together with the original product
information when the product is distributed.

The shadow product which will be merged together with the original product
information when the product is distributed.

put.summary: upload file to import product characteristics
